text: لَا يَسْتَوِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۚ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers [of success].
translation.id.indonesian: Tidaklah sama penghuni-penghuni neraka dengan penghuni-penghuni jannah; penghuni-penghuni jannah itulah orang-orang yang beruntung.
